review.comment: Super easy and convenient scheduling and drop off.  Work was done in a timely manner for a reasonable price.  The only thing I would change is to let people know of the lunch hour closing at the time of drop off.

They are great to work with. They owner Tedd O'Neill is very knowledgeable and tons of experience. He has a great staff and his techicians bring in years of experience. They bring it everytime and they update you throughout the process!! I rate them top-notch!! *****

This place is wonderful!! I’ve taken my car here on many occasions and they always do good work and get it done very quickly. Even though they’re a bit of a drive from my house, I always bring my car here because I trust them to give me a good and fair quote. Staff is also wonderfully kind and helpful.

I was recommended to this place for a couple simple hose replacements for my 2014 Ford Focus and was told it would cost $681. I run all auto estimates by my buddy who is a mechanic, who told me this was the most ridiculous scam of an overcharge they’d ever heard. Took my car into another shop and had the repairs preformed for $215. Would absolutely never come here for anything ever again.
Took my 70 GTO transmission in for a rebuild.  They did an excellent job in a timely manner.  Would highly recommend.

I highly recommend O’Neill Auto and Transmission. I appreciated their excellent communication, no nonsense service and quality work. There were no surprises, and the vehicle was back on the road with a new Alternator, Water Pump and Thermostat the next day.

Thanks.

My mechanic for many years retired, he was fair with prices and importantly, he was honest.
It's hard to find those out there, with these qualities, but I brought my vehicle to O'Neill and they could of said anything, to do more service on my vehicle, for more money, but did not. So I believe I have found myself some new honest mechanics.
This is the only place I trust for any transmission work. I've taken a few different cars there and have always been impressed with the quality.

A+ service - Had a FULL transmission rebuild on our 2006 Jeep Wrangler- NO transmission rebuild is EVER cheap but they were fair, did a great job, caught a few other pending issues and were on time- Other vehicles repairs will be coming here as well now - Highly recommend

Even though the service was just a normal maintenance (Drain, Flush, Repl Filter & Fluid), they got me in quickly and completed the work in short order. Will use then again when I need normal maintenance or anything else.

I had them fix a transmission issue and they did it quickly and fair price. Then I took it back to them because my truck didn’t have good heat. They wound up having to replace the heater core which a very complex job on my vehicle. It took them a little longer than I had hoped but in the end they got the job done and they got it done right for a very reasonable price.
Great service Sharon did a great job responding and working with our warranty com6
Always detailed and so very helpful. Even on a 92 degree day when i just stopped in. Very thankful

My first reaction after making an appointment at O’Neill Transmissions was relief. I had purchased an extended warranty when I bought my used car and I was extremely frustrated with their demands when my transmission began to fail. Once I took the car into O’Neill’s they took over with the warranty company. My life was instantly easier although the warranty people did not make it easy on the repair professionals. O’Neill’s did a wonderful job and the car is 100%. They kept me informed during each part of the repair process and they did a comprehensive estimate of all that needed to be done.

Had two rear differentials rebuilt a total of about $3500. The first one my 07 Chevy truck went OK. The only thing weird about the truck they called the day of to pick up and asked if I would like the axle bearings replaced while they were in there I thought that was rather odd when you say you would rebuild  you would think that would be included.     The one I had the biggest issue with was my 2010 liberty had the rear end rebuilt when picked up it was louder and making more noise than when brought there, they said bring it back they would fix it under warranty , Which was great. But when I picked it up after they fixed it the second time I noticed they replaced the rear end with a junkyard one and when I looked under there it was all rusted and looked very old and I was never notified that they were going to take out the original rear end and replace it with a junkyard one ,which they did not even rebuild or put seals in .When I called the next day to inquire about it the only solution I got was they were going to paint it and they did say I was lucky because the E brake lines from the junkyard one was better than mine I should be happy, so put a long story short I paid $1500 for a used junkyard rear end

O’Neill Auto and Transmission Services provided great customer service. They handled my car with great care, and provided excellent communication throughout the entire process! I would highly recommend this place to anyone having car issues!
Fantastic people
It’s hard to find good people who will do quality work. I had to take my car back a couple times to fully resolve my car’s issues, but each time I felt well taken care of.
Great service. Also very fast service. No complaints.

I was told by another auto shop from my home town that my muffler was completely rusted out and needed to be replaced. I didn't have time to do this before coming back to GR so I took it to O'Neill. Turns out there was nothing wrong with my muffler! It would have been so easy to fix something that didn't need fixing because that's what I asked for but they were so honest and respectful and I'm so appreciative for that! So many other auto shops would have taken advantage of that opportunity. They also replaced my wheel bearing for a very affordable price and were so quick. Dropped it off the night before and they had it done by 11:30 AM the next day. I've had friends that had the same problem with their car and it took weeks for their auto shop to fix it and they were quoted SO much more. Definitely going back to them as long as I live in GR!
Have not had my service completed yet, but Doug was very professional and informative! So far,so good.

After taking my son's Jeep Liberty to what has been our family mechanic, and having it sit on the lot for almost two weeks while they couldn't figure out the issue... we finally brought it around the corner to O'Neill's. Of course we were expecting the worse, but they found the issue was corrosion on some ground wires, and the bill ended up being less than $100. Character and class through and through, can't say enough positive things about this experience!
My car  works well now that I went to their show.

O'Neil is the place to go for honest straight up repair work. These folks really know their stuff and will go the extra mile to make sure you are back on the road and repaired right the first time. Highly recommend this place for all your automotive service work needs!

I'm in the process of restoring a 2004 Ford Ranger with an automatic transmission that had 225K miles on it.   It was pulled by another shop with the motor and given to O'Neill's to do a bench repair.    In hind site I probably should have just bought a new transmission because mine was pretty much end of life.   Ted was true to his word and quote and rebuilt the unit which required a lot more parts than normal.    It wasn't a smooth repair by any stretch but they never once pushed back on me and he made everything right.  He even gave me a discount for paying cash.    I now have a truck that shifts way better than new and I'm very happy!!!!!    This could have easily turned into one of those car repair horror stories but it DIDN'T because O'Neill's is a great transmission shop with a great owner and staff!!!
O'Neal diagnosed and made the repairs necessary to get my car up and running.  They  communicate readily with you so you know what is going on.
Guys did a great job on my infinity recently. Doug has been nothing shy of excellent helping me understand my issues and the solution

Ted O’Neill and his team are very professional and extremely knowledgeable in their field.  Their detailed inspection of your vehicle, will involve all components, categorizing areas of concern based on urgency.  Dedication, quality service and competitive pricing has earned them their long time loyalty in the auto repair industry.  I would highly recommend their services!

These guys exceeded my expectaions in every category. From taking their time explaining why my vehicle broke to completing the job ahead of schedule. It is clear why they have been in business  since 1960.

I brought my truck in to have the transmission inspected and possibly worked on depending on the price. A week after my truck was brought in, they called and said they had already begun working on my truck and it was going to be $1500. I told them I hadn't approved this work and that i only told them to inspect my vehicle. They estimated they work they already done to be around $750 which is outrageous for work that I have not approved. I told them to put it back together how it was and push it out of the shop. Once I got my truck towed back to my house, I saw they just dumped the transmission off in the bed off my truck along with the fly wheel, clutch plate, front and rear drive shafts exhaust system and transfer case. They had also left scattered parts all over the inside of the cab of my vehicle. Now im going to have to pay another shop twice as much money just to peice my truck back together. I would never recommend O'Neills to anybody. They are unprofessional and unreliable.

Super happy with my experience at O'Neills! Brought my Toyota Camry here for what was expected to be a transmission issue but turned out to be my knock sensors and catalytic converter. They had the repairs done and the car ready to be picked up in a day and when the same issues cropped up again a day later they had me back in and fixed again with the work covered under warranty, no questions asked. Communicated clearly and professionally the whole time and were super helpful and informative. Thanks guys!

Never had the opportunity to get work done here, so I can't speak on that, however, I was severely disappointed in the customer service that I received. When I went to their shop to talk about the issues I was having, I was talked down to, and spoken to as if I knew nothing. Even when I started talking about my experience level, I was flat out told that I wouldn't be able to ever do these repairs on my own because rear axle assemblies "have too many nuances". They used big words and fear tactics to make the job seem way bigger than it was. Before leaving, they took my information and my vin number, told me they'd contact me back, and not only have I not heard from them in a week and a half to two weeks, but I've already had another shop do the work done while waiting to hear back. Would not recommend, will not be seeking any work done for future vehicles or projects.

Outstanding service, trustworthy and efficient!
Thank you!
Great service. Fair & honest staff.
Very friendly people. Got me in quick when I had a bad battery. Went above and beyond and told me why my car was leaking oil.

I just picked my car up yesterday after a radiator issue. It was my second time visiting and all was perfect both times. The person working in the office was organized and kept close communication. They seek detailed information from you and seem to pass info amongst themselves assuring that nothing is lost along the line. I had gone other places with my car's issues before coming here. Both times, I felt so much more comfortable throughout the process. No hunches, no pressures.
Would not reccomend.
review.review_reply: Is there anything we can do to help you?: Can you help us understand your non recommendation by calling us or emailing us at service@oneillstransmission.com
